column4: What would you guys recommend for video card type, ATI or nVidia for Gutsy?  I have a old ATI Radeon 9000 which is a colossal pain to get working... so thinking of breaking down and just getting a new card.
nVidia now, but soon, ATi drivers will be better.
I have an nvidia card in my laptop running feisty and it runs fantastic
Yeah, right now, nVidia is better than ATI for Linux, but in a few years, there'll be open-source ATI drivers that will be much better.
